summary: When a village belle's brother is killed by a bandit, she vows revenge and enlists the help of two truckers-cum-theatre artists in her mission.
cast: Aamir Khan|Twinkle Khanna|Faisal Khan|Johnny Lever|Navneet Nishan|Veeru Krishnan|Asrani|Tiku Talsania|Archana Puran Singh|Tanvi Azmi|Ayub Khan|Omkar Kapoor|Parmeet Sethi|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Tinnu Verma|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Subbiraj|Viju Khote|Anirudh Agarwal|Harish Patel|G.P. Singh|Anil Upadhyay|Razak Khan|Indira Chowdhary|Gurbachan Singh|Sanjay Batra|Rajeev Verma|Sanjeev Siddharth|Chitresh Ranjan|Sharad Sankla|Chandu|Nandu|K.K. Azad|Jamdade|Ashraf Ul Haq|Arun|Narendra|Nilofar|Kavi Kumar Azad
title: Mela
